backend/main.mo: Implements user profiles, character creation, and chat session storage with access control and basic comparison helpers. Provides CRUD-style query and update methods for profiles, characters, and sessions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature tracking metadata mapping features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs. Used for build verification and traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme color tokens using OKLCH and applying global background and border utilities.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML boilerplate that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global theming, layout, and identity-based profile setup modal. Registers all major pages including chat, character builder, and movie mode.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and React Query cache clearing on sign-out. Handles authentication errors and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter their name, saving the profile once submitted. Displays automatically when no profile exists and identity is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/characters/Avata: Renders a grid of selectable avatar options with visual highlight for the active choice. Calls onSelect with the chosen avatar ID.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Form component for creating or updating a character, handling state, validation, avatar selection, and submit logic.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Textarea and send button for composing messages, with enter-to-send support and sendMessage mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageTime: Scrollable message list showing user and character messages with avatars, timestamps, and auto-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header navigation, authentication-aware links, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/movie/MoviePlaye: Movie-style player that animates message beats, manages playback controls, speed, and beat progression.
frontend/src/components/movie/Stage.tsx: Visual stage rendering backgrounds, characters, and subtitles based on the current movie beat.
frontend/src/components/movie/useMovieBe: Transforms chat messages into timed movie beats with speaker, acting cues, and duration calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing the backend actor, refreshing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, characters, sessions, and messages via an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with a cinematic aesthetic and filmâ€‘grain effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterPage.tsx: Displays and edits the user's character, redirecting unauthenticated users and showing a form once data loads.
frontend/src/pages/ChatSessionPage.tsx: Shows a specific chat session with messages and composer, handling loading, redirects, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Lists all chat sessions, allows starting new chats, and redirects if unauthenticated or missing a character.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that shows marketing content when logged out and navigation cards for character creation and chats when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/MovieModePage.tsx: Loads a chat session and its messages, redirects unauthenticated users, and renders the cinematic MoviePlayer view.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented features and requirements for a cinematic AI chat application.
